extDescription.message: Add furigana to Japanese text on any page for learning kanji pronunciation.

shortcutAddFurigana.message: Add furigana on the current page

shortcutToggleAutoMode.message: Toggle auto mode on all pages

shortcutToggleKanjiFilter.message: Toggle kanji filter on all pages

contentScriptWarningDesc1.message: The content is too large ($textLength$ characters) and may cause the page to become unresponsive. Auto mode has been disabled.

contentScriptWarningDesc2.message: Don't want to see this warning again? Go to Options page.
